name: Micro-Managed
description:
Micro-Managed

I made this game in 3 hours for Trijam #122. Play as an angry manager trying to keep your employees from falling asleep on the job!

You have 1 minute to run around waking up your employees and keeping the productivity high. Productivity goes down when employees are asleep and will only go up if they are all working.

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Hit the Space key to wake up the closest employee.

~Credits~

Music by: Anttis Instrumentals (Soundclick & Blogspot)

Sound Effects by: ZapSplat
